name: Terra's Strife 2
description:
The New Terra solar system was a peaceful place for many years until the Ignis Empire attacked and now rule with an iron fist. A courageous alliance of freedom fighters has have won their first victory against the Empire, but at a cost. Their capital ship has been severely damaged out in open space with the Empire's forces still in pursuit.

Hold off the Empire for as long as you can so you can fight another day.

-

Created in just over 7 days for Finally Finish Something. This is a remake/sequel of Terra's Strife which we created for Xander Jam.

-

Controls

WASD to move
Mouse to aim and shoot
Enter to select
R to restart

Credits

Rulste: Programming
Spud-Man: 3D Art
Ramseyj1990: Music & SFX
PattyPancake: Additional Support

Assets
Seamless Space Backgrounds
Celestial Objects

Tips
  • Capital ship health regenerates if it is not hit. Lure away ships at your own peril to protect it.
  • Score multipler scales with capital ship health. Keep it safe for the highscore!
